name: Halloween Hunt (deadongames)
description:
Created as a Scream Jam 2021 submission

Downloadable PC game / playable in browser

STORY 

It's Halloween night and you've put on your best witch costume for some treasure hunting fun! Explore the Halloween themed village and open chests to reveal treats (or tricks). Collect as many treats as you can before the time runs out!

WASD / Arrows Move around Press P Pause Game Press XInteract with chestsRight Mouse Click Select buttons Developers notes

This game is definitely more 'spooky fun' than blood-curdling horror but we have so many horror games in the works, we thought it might be nice to make a cute Halloween game for a change. 

Future improvements / suggestions :

  • More costumes for your main character
  • Shop where you can trade the treats you earn for upgrades / accessories 
  • More animations to bring the environment alive 
  • Tidy up the source code to make it easier to manage / scale
Assets / Resources
  • 16*16 Pixel art graveyard tileset by angrysnail (itch.io) (recoloured) by angrysnail (recoloured)
  • Audio clip (Evil Laugh) from Horror SFX Audio Bundle by Little Robot Sound Factory
  • All other graphical assets including characters, map, objects, animations and UI created by DeadOnGames using Piskel
  • Background music created by DeadOnGames using Bosca Coeil
  • Created with tutorials from Brakeys, Unity Learn and gamesplusjames
  • Created using Unity game engine and scripted in C#
  • Inspired by The Lost Night Release (lexaloffle.com) 

If you have any feedback / suggestions for future improvements please let us know in the comments below...
